Package cz.zcu.fav.kiv.jsim.gui

This package provides classes for graphical user interface of a running simulation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JSimDisplayable An object that implements the JSimDisplayable interface can be displayed in a component of the main GUI window.
 

Class Summary
JSimDetailedInfoWindow The JSimDetailedInfoWindow provides a dialog that shows a table with detailed information about a process, a queue, or any JSimDisplayable instance.
JSimChange JSimChange instances can register listeners to which information about a change in the simulation is sent.
JSimMainWindow The JSimMainWindow class provides services for graphic output.
JSimMainWindowList A JSimMainWindowList is a list whose items are simple descriptions of processes, queues, or other simulation elements.
JSimPair The JSimPair holds information about two objects – a name and a value.
 

Package cz.zcu.fav.kiv.jsim.gui Description

This package provides classes for graphical user interface of a running simulation. You will very likely not need to work directly with any of these classes unless you want to change the default display method of your simulation objects.

Since:
J-Sim version 0.1.2
